This is a testharness.js-based test.

[FAIL] Test metaKey of pointer boundary events (modifiers are changed before move): metaKey of pointerout should be true
  assert_true: expected true got false

  assert_true: expected true got false
[FAIL] Test metaKey of pointer boundary events (modifiers are changed after move): metaKey of pointerout should be true
  assert_true: expected true got false
